website_summaries.verdict: With a waterproof backing, this blanket prevents wet sand from soaking your dry towels. Dry sand easily wipes off the top.
pros: Soft mat surface with moisture-resistant bottom
Keeps wet sand from condensing into your bags
cons: Challenging to fold and fasten shut
Food can get ground into surface

customer_reviews.title: Very good size
customer_reviews.text: My family and I love it, my daughters now want to go and do picnic every week, it have very good quality and is a perfect size almost like a full size matress, easy to use and clean , my little princess always wanted to carrier with her everywhere we go
customer_reviews.author: yeraldine S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to line the floor part of my new car's trunk (FIAT 500X). I had to fold it in quarters to make it fit, so it's a pretty good sized mat. Heavier weight than expected. Great prouduct.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Crazy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picnic blanket
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I researched a while and decided on this one. There are so many good things about it. It folds up surprisingly small. It is easy to fold up the "correct" way as well. Happy with lovely design and color.I like the material. My primary use for this is during the summer, and I didn't want a flannel blanket, or one that would make you sweat sitting on it. This material is perfect! It's kind of like a soft canvas. It's a very good size as well. Perfect. Highly recommend it. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Harshit jain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent outdoor blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I researched a while and decided on this one. There are so many good things about it. It folds up surprisingly small. It is easy to fold up the "correct" way as well. I like the material. My primary use for this is during the summer, and I didn't want a flannel blanket, or one that would make you sweat sitting on it. This material is perfect! It's kind of like a soft canvas. It's a very good size as well, we and my twins and mom have used it with more than enough room to be comfortable. I recommend this blanket highly! Only con- I wish there were some prettier colors,
customer_reviews.author: Melyssa  Braman

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Cute -- I love pulling it out of my beach bag Clean -- Easy to get any sand, grass, or food off it Cheap -- for less than $20 this is more than worth the money Con: Could be a little wider -- having two adults laying side by side on it at the beach introduces some elbow rubbing Could be less slippery -- if you put this down on a slope, you might want to add beach towels on top of it so you don't slide around
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: Since its getting warm we bought this to get ready for beach and picnic season. I was pleased overall. I personally didn't enjoy the feeling of the material but it didn't soak up water and seems like it will be easy to wipe clean. I liked that it folds on itself into the little handle. I bought it to leave in the car so that made it compact which is convient. Unfortunately I had a bit of a difficult time trying to fold this the correct way. It took me multiple tries to get right and doesn't include folding instructions. Overall though I recommend this blanket. I hope this review was helpful
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Great picnic blanket
customer_reviews.text: Bulkier and heavier than expected, with that said it's also bigger and not as thin as other similar products. It's really is water proof but have not tested it with sand. Bought it because we spend a lot of time in the park after school and also concerts/movies at the park during summer which I suspect this will be perfect for it. Pretty easy to fold, wish it had better velcro because it had come undone a couple of times causing it to get dirty from the sidewalk but a wet wipe took care of that. In all good investment for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely water proof!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this in anticipation for a rainy outdoor concert. It ended up being SO RAINY that even the best rain gear was failing and everything was sopping wet. When we got to the concert area, we sat in our (wet) concert chairs & my son and I used this as our cover. It provided some WARMTH and worked well as a rain cover. Super easy to wipe the mud off and dry. 4 stars only bc it could have been slightly lighter in weight and therefore more pliable to fold up and also to carry in a backpack for a loooong line.
customer_reviews.author: J.Han

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful beach blanket.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the size n color and design. Looks unique and beautiful and goes well with Florida vibe. It’s thick so I hope it’ll last longer. It’s big enough for 2 people to lie down with coolers n backpack lying on it. It cleans with damp clothes without much efforts. What I don’t like is it’s hard to fold it. May be I’ll get used to that. And it has a carry on handle so I carry it separately so that’s one more thing to carry but I like the comfort so worth that.
customer_reviews.author: Storyteller

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down - more tarp-like than padded blanket
customer_reviews.text: The picture of the blue-orange checkered blanket in the product description, which they used to sell, isn't what they are selling anymore. This used to be a really nice waterproof 3-layer blanket, with a padded core that was great. I own one. The ones they sell now is a thin tarp-like blanket, without padded core. Trust me, it makes a huge difference. You may as well sit on a plastic tarp or plastic bag. I can't recommend this - try to find 3-layers blankets, which are much sturdier and don't fly away at the first soft breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Schnacka

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket, hard to fold
customer_reviews.text: This blanket has come on many adventures with me this year. It's perfect. It's waterproof on both sides, so a spilled beer won't ruin the party. It folds up into itself, so even if you take it to the beach, it won't get sand all over your car. And if you fold it right, you can carry it by the little handle. The only shortcoming is that it's a little complicated to fold up just right. I ended up marking the folds on it with a sharpie, which made it way easier to pack up at the end of a long day in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Picnic at your home
customer_reviews.text: I had no expectation as this is my first purchase of any kind of mat for the outdoor purpose. I am satisfied how easy to wrap it up after each use,easy to carry without a bulky feel. Its waterproof too means no worry of spillage and easy to clean. I had a picnic like setup in my apartment’s patio which was made possible because of this mat. I do not know if they have larger sizes too in this format,as I found this size little smaller to what i wanted. Overall worth the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Fabi

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: Good size, easy enough to fold up. I like the velcro enclosure, so it's not just a pile in my trunk. The material is easy to wipe off... which leads me to the downside. It's not breathable, so it's not super comfortable when it's 100 degrees out. You can throw a blanket on top, and it'll keep your blanket clean and off the ground and would be more comfortable. But that's just one more thing to carry. Overall, I like it though, and would buy another if we needed a replacement. I might even get a second one to put in my boyfriend's car. It would work well to cover the seats after going to the lake or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: T. Larkins

customer_reviews.title: Really Just a Patterned Tarp
customer_reviews.text: If you're imagining that this has a soft, blanket-like surface, don't be fooled. It's more like the plasticized cover of a public bus seat. I would have preferred a cotton or microfiber top with a vinyl bottom. This is difficult to fold back to its compact shape, and it smells terrible out of the box - think that head-ache inducing smell of a cheap pool toy. Spend more a quality blanket. This only works well as a tarp, but then, if that's what you want, why not just buy a tarp?
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Slatford

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack and wont be blown away by wind, reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has some weight to it and thus won't be easily blown away by the wind. Being waterproof is also a big plus esp if the ground is damp. Finally it is compact enough that you can store it in the boot of your car alongside (or inside) the spare tire. One thing I am worried about it is how to clean it. I think that (if) it gets dirty I will have to clean just the dirty areas using a spray+brush cuz I wont be able to put it in a washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put over my patio furniture in the morning when it's dewy and the dogs pick up dirt. It's super cute and works perfectly. I haven't washed it yet, so I'm hoping it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Curtains for privacy archways
customer_reviews.text: These are the best curtains for outdoors ever. Pretty much totally waterproof. Heavy!!!! 2 sided so the beautiful colors are for me and my family to view and the neighbors I love but dont want to constantly have them see me any where in my gorgeous pooll/hottub/tons of gardens and different sitting locations.... YARD. And sometimes.... I would rather not see what they are doing. BUT AGAIN, I LOVE MY CLOSE NEIGHBORS......
customer_reviews.author: bullcube2010

customer_reviews.title: Great all around ground cloth for picnicing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ground cloth for picnicing and use on dry or damp grass or on the beach. I bought this for my highschooler to use as they are being sent outside as much as possible during study hall and lunch because of Covid. As far as folding, just keep thinking “thirds.” Also, it’s a bit heavier than I expected as the high school kids need to carry everything in their backpacks all day. Locker use is not allowed this year. I wish it were a little lighter.
customer_reviews.author: B Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the money, but I bought it planning to pack lightweight and small for an outdoor event I was attending. I ended up buying a poncho that doubles as a tarp instead. I did, however keep this, because even though it's not great for lightweight travel, it does seem like a great blanket to throw down at an outdoor concert or movie or picnic that I can just toss in the trunk of the car.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this "Blanket" because it's not even blanket material. It's PERFECT for outdoors and accidental spills. I put this on wet grass (didn't realize it was still wet) and nothing soaked through. It's easy to clean and fold back up. I'd definitely recommend this to anyone out doors a lot with kiddos.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Good for soft ground only
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our RV placing a mat below the steps for comfort when stepping in or out of the RV. This doesn't provide that comfort at all. It is really thin and pretty small and would be better suited for the beach or placing on the grass for a picnic. Most RV parks are on some sort of gravel or rock when you set up and this does not provide any protection against that.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Light & compact! Big! But there’s a catch ...
customer_reviews.text: We grabbed it for a picnic at s local park. We are two adults and 2 miniature schnoodles. This was the right size for us. More handsomely rugged looking - photos don’t do the blanket just. A little wonky at first to fold but after the 3rd fold up in a day, it was fast and easy. DON’T like that in order to fold you need to lay the blanket down on the ground which means all the grass you just shook off it is now back on. Aggravating. (Still love the blanket though.)
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Very cute design, but I really don’t like this material.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to get dirty and not easy to clean. Although the Product Description claims that this product is “Easy to Clean”, I still can’t remove the dirt spot on the surface(I followed the instruction). It was my first time using it, and it already got dirty and can not be cleaned...so I returned it. But I have to say that the quality looks really good, I just really don't like the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: yung hao

customer_reviews.title: Easy and light weight for picnics and the beach.
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this picnic matt. Its light weight and easy to step up and put away. The only thing I was a little bummed about I thought it was larger. Planning on buying another so the family can fit comfortably. So far I've taken it to the beach and park and we have been very happy. Its water proof and large enough so two adults can lay down on but not big enough for two adults and two kids.
customer_reviews.author: Milly C.

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect durable picnic mat for all sorts of events - ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect durable picnic mat for all sorts of events - picnics, fireworks, beach. I love taking this to the beach! I usually put this down first and then the towels on top. The sand shakes off of this so easily and it keeps my towels from getting all gross with sand. The only reason I give it 4 stars instead of 5 is I have a hard time folding it up as it's shown in the picture. When I do manage too though, it's the perfect size! Really compact for such a durable mat.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H.

customer_reviews.title: Great until it molded
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket on the recommendation of a friend. I've generally liked it--it's a little tough to fold but it's a great outdoor ground throw. I bought it over a year ago and I've used it ten times or less, but recently it's begun to mold. I've gone at it with bleach, hand scrubbed, etc. but the mold won't stop coming back. I store it in a cool dry linen closet so I truly don't understand. I wouldn't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlionator

customer_reviews.title: I love bringing this around and get lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I love bringing this around and get lots of compliments. Only downside is I can't seem to get rid of the plastic smell from the blanket. It's also pretty uncomfortable, I ususally bring blankets to put on top. I love that it's waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Antonina Moskalets

customer_reviews.title: Extra large and waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: It is excellent. Fits a family fo 4. Folds easily and carries easy with the handle. Totally blocks wet grass from ruining your bottom. Seems very sturdy. Have used it the whole summer indoor and outdoors. Many many uses, at beach, on grass, as play area for little ones. Well made. Can't say enough. Best product formvalue. Buy it, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: lapc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outside
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket! Personally I hate sitting on grass so I bought this for the spring/summer months (though the pandemic really messed up my plans) for hanging with friends outside etc. easy to fold, easy to store, easy to carry, easy all around. Very happy with this purchase. I am 6’1 and am able to lay down comfortably
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic outdoor blanket!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this blanket three times, and we so far love it! We used it in the wind, and it didn’t so much as slide from its spot. We have had picnics on it with kids, and we wiped the spills up easily after we ate. We like that it folds down so neatly—we had a little bit of a challenge folding it back up, but that’s because we’re a little challenged with that sort of thing. 😬 all in all, we’re really pleased with the blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love it! But hard to refold
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hanging out on our Brooklyn roof during quarantine, it’s been great! Wish it was a bit lighter weight and easier to fold, not sure how much I’ll be dragging this out of the house this summer, but it was absolutely worth the low cost for what it is. The wire cutter nailed this one!
customer_reviews.author: beckeyz

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy blanket, but on the heavy side
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern - it's hard to find a pretty yet not too busy pattern for picnic blankets. I love how the bottom is waterproof so I don't have to worry about damp grass. I also think it's great how it folds up and there's a handle. It's also a very good size. Two adults can lay down comfortable, and up to 4 adults can sit down comfortably to eat or talk. I took one star away because of how heavy it is. When I compared this to another picnic blanket this one was just SO heavy and bulky. But it's okay because that means it's more sturdy and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient picnic blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is such a convenient blanket to have. I love going to the park and having a picnic and hang out with friends. It's pretty easy to fold and appears to be water resistant on at least one side which is great. I would say my only complaint is that the blanket is kind of heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Compact
customer_reviews.text: I always forget to bring a blanket. My daughter is 1 and she is not a huge fan of grass so I always want to bring a blanket for her to sit on but I never know when we might sit on the ground so I forget it but this is compact and specific purpose of being a picnic blanket. I just leave it in the car so it’s ready to go. The material is nice and the compact carrying case is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lexus

customer_reviews.title: great outdoor blanket
customer_reviews.text: We used this out on the grass and at the beach and we found it very useful and easy to fold, clean, and keep dry. It is not soft and cushy as a blanket would but for it's purpose I don't think it needs to be. It takes little room and it has a nice pattern. Looks well made so I hope it lasts a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla G.

customer_reviews.title: Good blanket and good price
customer_reviews.text: I would give it an additional star if it packed a little more easily. This is what we were looking for after getting wet butts on a few outdoor outings. It certainly solves that problem and it large enough for a few people. It should get a lot of use next summer. We also love the design, looks like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Bonzilass

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and tarp-like
customer_reviews.text: We have another picnic blanket that is waterproof and soft. We loved it so we trying to find another. This one is quite a disappointment it's heavy and feels like you're sitting on a tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hill

customer_reviews.title: Works as it's supposed to, but the bottom material scratches easily and weird print.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this multiple times, it tends to get a bit difficult to fold when it's windy but that's about it. Mine has a weird print in the back but doesn't really matter. Although the biggest gripe that I have is the material on the back deteriorates a bit easy.
customer_reviews.author: AndyEu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I fold it and put it in my diaper bag. So my baby has something to play on wherever we go. It big enough that I can sit with her too.
customer_reviews.author: Janis

customer_reviews.title: high quality picnic blanket
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is constructed with quality material - durable and easy to put away. It doesn't weigh too much, which makes easy to carry around. The pineapple pattern is the main reason why I chose this picnic blanket over other blankets I saw on Amazon. I would highly recommend this item to others looking for a decent picnic blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Valued Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. Material is rubery and quite ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected . Material is rubery and quite stiff... sand and dirt gets on the plasticy side, and you have to clean it (woth wet towel or smth) after every use. Would not recomend ...
customer_reviews.author: Ambers

customer_reviews.title: Best picnic/beach blanket!
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time, at the park, beach, yard- you name it. It lives in my car's trunk so that it's always on hand if we need it while we're out. It cleans very easily and I can put it on wet grass and not have water soak through it. It seems to fold pretty easily too. I'd buy it again and recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ren Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off by saying we haven't used this yet but I know it will come in super handy for picnic or outdoor concerts/events. It's efficient, lightweight, easy to fold and store in the car or a backpack. So much easier than folding up towels or large blankets that we've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferW

customer_reviews.title: Great value - can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Great value here for the money. Decent color options - not trendy but not out of date. It’d be nice if the logo matched that though; it’s got a modern logo, but color options are not. Stitching feels durable and can’t wait to field test. Just wish it would be a bit thicker. It’s dense, but I would pay more for thickness if that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outings in the park
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for outings in the park, beach or anywhere else you want to set up camp. I always have it in my car for in case. My friends and I went to an outdoor concert. There were no chairs available so people sat in the grassy area and I brought this along and it was perfect for all 3 of us to sit on. It's so easy to re fold and pack it up. I have 2 one for my car and one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Carita615

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold up, thick, good quality, and can be wiped down clean very easily. The only reason I am giving 4 starts and not 5 is because the top layer of fabric is rather rough and not so much of a blanket feel. If they could figure out how to make the fabric finer it would feel softer perhaps? The good thing about it being thick is that you can put it down on a gravely surface and still feel fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Use all the time
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time. Best thing I’ve bought in awhile. Great for parks, swimming, splash pools, picnics. Even used it to cover us when it started to pour rain and kept us dry. Easy to clean fold and store. We keep it in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family picnics or beach days.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for on the go! Easy to fold and it turns into its own bag! It doesn’t soak up any water or dirt. I have not washed it so I don’t know how it washes in the washing machine. It’s pretty big too. Fits my family of 5, 2 adults 3 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and stays clean
customer_reviews.text: I opened it up and let it sit outside for several hours to let it off-gas. After that, I have not had any issues with the chemical smell. The colors are vibrant, it folds into a very compact size, and it seems that it will be pretty easy to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: RKU

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best folding design
customer_reviews.text: I like this blanket overall. It's durable and water resistant but still comfortable. The only issue is that it folds upside-down so you can't just fold it up on the ground after use, you have to turn it over and get the softer side dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: The perfect little picnic blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well made blanket. Easy to clean and blocks moisture from the grass so you don't get damp. Easy to re-fold up. Compact and pretty light weight - the 3 year old likes to carry it to the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this item. It is waterproof. But the material is scratchy, even just sitting on it is uncomfortable. The lightest breeze was causing it to move and flap in the wind. It just wasn't practical for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of my favorite purchases I’ve ever made! I’m a very fickle and picky buyer, too, haha. I enjoy the convenience of this mat, for its size, weight, usefulness and ease of use. We are a family of 5, and all of us could fit on here if we are sitting. It’s sturdy and soft at the same time. I’ve had it about 2 months and so far it’s holding up very well. Perfect for picnics, or just lounging in the yard. I’ve even done yoga on it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin87

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Does the job- My husband and I have twins and we were able to take this to the beach and all sit on it with plenty of space. It worked really well and am most likely going to purchase another to have as backup .
customer_reviews.author: ParishDreamsB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, waterproof, great size for 3-4 adults.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this blanket! It’s been a lifesaver at parks and picnics. It takes a little effort and coordination to roll it back up to align the Velcro perfectly, but fortunately the hooks work on the flannel as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Great Picnic, pool, & beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful! I purchased this to have for our trips to the pool and my family beach vacation. I’ve used it several times now and adore it. The pattern is pretty and it’s not heavy to carry at all. When we sit on it after getting out of the water, the water sits there and rolls off, it doesn’t absorb (hence the waterproof). Folding is easy but sometimes doesn’t line up with the Velcro so I have to redo it but that wouldn’t make me not use it! I can’t wait to take it to the beach and see how it does in the sand. I am a bit worried about the sand sticking into the Velcro though.
customer_reviews.author: Justine k.

customer_reviews.title: Won't last that long, can't machine wash
customer_reviews.text: I've had this blanket for maybe 3 years and the waterproof underside fabric is cracked at the seams. Also it get kinda gross over time and you can't machine wash it. In retrospect I wish I had bought the Skip Hop blanket that can go in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor blanket is perfect for our lifestyle. We take it everywhere! Camping, fishing, beach, just in the yard, ball games. It’s lightweight, easy to pack and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Emmy S.

customer_reviews.title: Picnic Blanket
customer_reviews.text: I got this picnic blanket because I take my daughter on picnics a lot. I really like the size of it. It has a lot of room. It is easy to clean. You can just wipe it off. It folds easily and goes right back together. I really like that. I put it in my picnic basket. The pineapple color is also nice and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Colors, but good blanket
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a great mat/blanket so far. My only issue is that in the picture it looks like a red & navy plaid, which I bought to go with our school colors. When it arrived it was red & black. I am disappointed in the colors. Performance-wise, it is good, though.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie G.

customer_reviews.title: One of the better bits of gear I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year now, and love it. It's been to parks, beaches, in the mountains, and I never regret having it on hand. It's so compact, and darn cute, and it's nice to not have a sandy/wet/uncomfortable keister when enjoying nature.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, nice soft material
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for multiple people to sit on. Also works to keep you dry if it suddenly starts raining, you just flip it over and the black waterproof material will keep you dry while you're under it, and the material stays dry that way for when the rain stops!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: good quality and pretty big in size
customer_reviews.text: A good water resistant mat, its easy to place stuffs on this and stays steady , I didnt want something of a cloth material- so this worked the best for me . and anything spilt on it or dirty- easy to wipe with a wet wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Simi

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, folds up nice, and makes picnics a win!
customer_reviews.text: The MIU picnic blanket is perfect for outdoors folks. We use ours when we go on hikes, picnics, or relaxing in the park. It's easy to fold/unfold and fairly priced. The only thing that I might clarify in the "blanket's" description is that the material of the MIU blanket is more that of a thin plastic tarp then a blanket. There's not a lot of padding, and it is not a soft material, but it serves the purpose re: preventing you from sitting in the grass, or on muddy ground.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Goshen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor summer concerts
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Just what I was looking for to use at the summer outdoor concerts we attend. Both sides are water resistant and durable. Anything that gets spilled on it can be easily wiped off - won't soak in. It's large enough to fit 2 adults comfortably, or more with people sitting a bit closer. I love how it folds up and is carryable. Very easy to transport. Look forward to using this summer.
customer_reviews.author: tinman

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: This "blanket" is ok for going to the pool as it is waterproof, but I'm not crazy about how stiff and "plastic-like" it feels. I have another semi-waterproof picnic blanket that is softer and machine washable that I prefer over this one.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is fully waterproof and doesn’t feel like it on top, which is hard to find on outdoor blankets. It folds pretty easily and has velco to secure it together when folded. I would highly recommend and will most likely be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Zheleznyak

customer_reviews.title: Nice little blanket
customer_reviews.text: I guess once you get the hang of it - it’s easy to fold. I just didn’t have the brain power after a long day. Well made & sturdy. I have not washed it yet to review.
customer_reviews.author: swelmelz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picnic blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love this picnic blanket! I always bring my lunch to work and eat at the park. This blanket is easy to fold, cute and def water resistant. The sprinklers had just shut off and I laid the blanket out and no water seeped through.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K

customer_reviews.title: Second one I've bought
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second blanket I've gotten from this company, just in a different pattern. I love it and have already gotten my use out of it in the last month or so since I bought!
customer_reviews.author: L. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Gets hot to sit on
customer_reviews.text: The side of the blanket you sit on is not cloth but rather feels plasticky so gets hot when the sun shines on it. But is great for damp grass. I use it at softball tournaments for my grandsons. It is PERFECT when in the shade or on a cooler day.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: At least dont get the thicken version coz it is too heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I got the thicken version thinking that will be more comfortable but honestly it was too heavy! There is no way a normal person would carry that much extra weight to a picnic or for camping. It is just NOT worth the trouble. Not sure about the normal version though.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Can hold multiple adults comfortably and the waterproof aspect has effectively kept my rear ...
customer_reviews.text: Can hold multiple adults comfortably and the waterproof aspect has effectively kept my rear dry on multiple occasions. The only downside is folding it up when it's gotten wet - You need to find a place to lay it out to dry. You'd really have that problem with any blanket, though, so this is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smitley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality. This feels like my great grandmas plastic couch covering, yet somehow soaks up moisture and takes days to air dry outside in the dry heat.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Took this to my daughter’s lunch on the lawn at school. It is better then bringing a blanket or towel, it’s thick enough where the sides don’t move. It did have a funny smell when I first opened it but a throw in the washer took care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great product, I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage! I take this everywhere due to it's portability, my 2 kids (aged 5 and 7) love that their "important" things (toys, books) don't touch the ground when we are at the park, pool, etc. Cleans easily and I have never had any problems folding it back up to it's original state.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug676

customer_reviews.title: Good blanket but with weird shipping defects
customer_reviews.text: So first of all the blanket shipped to me with black dots in various places on it as if like somehow sharpie dots got on it, additionally there's were weird sticky white spots on the back side of the blanket. Those concerns aside this picnic blanket works really well it's fairly comfortable and is really handy for wet grass. I've had it blow up on me so you'll still need to put something down on the corners if it's a windy day. I would say it can comfortably seat 3 adults, 4 is kind of pushing it.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: It's too bad since I like the theme of pineapples
customer_reviews.text: This was not what was expected as far as a blanket type. The material described was not what it was when I received the item. It was hard and uncomfortable to sit on. I want to return this but the return window was already closed by the time I had the chance to. It's too bad since I like the theme of pineapples.
customer_reviews.author: Maricris F.

customer_reviews.title: cute and valueable
customer_reviews.text: This picnic blanket is so cute, easy to fold, and so so big! It is perfect for socially distanced picnics. It is sturdy and easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Chau

customer_reviews.title: Got so many compliments on the beach
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful picnic blanket, folds back really nice, clean easily and beautiful design, most of all great value, at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Larger than what I needed, but very nice for more than 3 people
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased this for a school picnic that my husband and I attended with my son. It was way too big and we knew people would say...where do they think they are going...to the beach? It went back
customer_reviews.author: Syl C

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Waterproof Mat Perfect for Picnics!
customer_reviews.text: I love these waterproof mats for taking outside to the beach or to keep in the car for anytime we need to sit outside. Love the colors on this one. It folds back up into itself and Velcros together. It’s easy to fold back together.
customer_reviews.author: Pendragon1977

customer_reviews.title: Love the pineapples!
customer_reviews.text: I love this beach/park blanket and can’t wait for the picnics :-) it’s cute and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great picnic blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This waterproof picnic blanket has been great! We have used it outside as well as inside the living room. It is easy to wipe and shake off. It folds up very easily as well. I am considering getting a second!
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: Great beach blanket
customer_reviews.text: I used this for laying on the sand on the beach. Works great. Most sand brushes off easily. Good size. Folds up easily.
customer_reviews.author: templink

customer_reviews.title: Great for a picnic
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for my daughter’s field trip. Great size, Folds easily, was not as light weight as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Latonya H

customer_reviews.title: this seemed like a nice blanket at first
customer_reviews.text: this seemed like a nice blanket at first, but after one use I tried to wash some dirt off of it and it had somehow stained, then the plastic waterproofing material tore and began to peel off the underside of the blanket. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: negar siadatnejad

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Well,I like the pineapple pattern. It’s really cut. But the smell is so strong. I cannot let my son stay on it too long. And the material is not expecting as I want. But I like the size.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beach
customer_reviews.text: Used at the beach and was perfect for what we needed. Put a cooler on one end and a bag of towels on the other and it didn't go anywhere on a super windy day. Harder to fold back correctly with the wind blowing, but that's more of nature's fault than the products.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: Decent size for the price.Great color scheme
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Would comfortably fit 2 people. Possibly four if are really small people. Material feels decent and very easy to fold!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality beach mat
customer_reviews.text: Great multi purpose mat. Very large which is rare but awesome. Easy to fold and easy to dust off after the beach. Plus it's cute!
customer_reviews.author: CBelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect concert, picnic, beach or park blanket. It is big and easy to clean. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, but I needed it to be a little bigger. But for 2 people it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Thin/Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely waterproof, easy to fold, and lightweight as advertised. It is really flimsy/thin- almost like a vinyl tablecloth.
customer_reviews.author: Catsweaterswag

customer_reviews.title: This looks pretty decent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend it if you plan on going out and party with your friends outdoor. The best thing is the water resistant material.
customer_reviews.author: Ahsan

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket
customer_reviews.text: We use this blanket several times a week. It fits two adults and our toddler easily with space for her to play and us to stretch out, eat lunch etc. It wipes clean easily, and folds quickly. We took it to the beach and when we were done we were able to shake the sand off without any issue. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Janaya

customer_reviews.title: Compact size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s folds into a purse size bag and the material used looks high quality. Just opened it but haven’t used it. It’s a bit difficult to completely remove stains because it sort of gets absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: We have used this hundreds of times! Used it for picnics and even for stuff in the house like playdom. Folds up small so you can keep it in the car. Buy it, just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Pefect size
customer_reviews.text: I though it was going to be too big, but description says 4-6 person, but for me two person full layed down can fit very comfortable which is what I was loking for
customer_reviews.author: CAROLINA

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. Not sure how long they will last, material seems a little cheap, will do update once I have used it a few times
customer_reviews.author: OpenKari
